# RESTClient
The cross-platform tool to work with http.


## Installation
For most users, the recommended method to install is via pip:
```cmd
pip install pyrestclient
```

or from source:

```cmd
python setup.py install
```

## Import
```python
from pyrestclient import RESTClient
```
---
